description: This file defines a layout component for a Qwik-based web application. It imports styles and components, handles server-side cache control, and renders a structure with navigation and a slot for nested content.

methods.name: onGet
methods.description: Request handler that manages cache control headers for server responses.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Qwik component wrapper for defining UI components.

methods.name: useStyles$
methods.description: Hook for applying CSS styles within a Qwik component.

methods.name: useLocation
methods.description: Hook to access the current URL location.
